Course_Name: GPE: GPE Projects for GCSM Summer Semester 2024

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Metal Hydride Energy Storage project meeting

Messages.Author: Clemens Biet
Messages.Content: Dear students, this is only for those of you who are interested in my project "Metal Hydride Energy Storage". As of now, 7 students took this project as their first choice and I see no problem that all of these students can participate. Still, I would like to offer an online meeting in order for us to get to know each other a little more and talk about the project. The meeting will be on Monday 18th of March at 10:00 using this zoom link. https://tu-berlin.zoom.us/j/6845346824?pwd=Z2gxUHlaZkJFOTQ4OVNlV1crbi92Zz09 If you can't make it, let me know via ISIS or email. If many people prefer a different day/time we can also shift this. Best regards, Clemens Biet

Messages.Author: Mustafa Anil Safran
Messages.Content: Dear Students, we have asked the Project moderators to contact you for the projects you have selected. Until 10th of March discussion on your first choices shall be finished. After that until the 22th March discussion for on your second choices shall be discussed with the respective moderators. After that if there are any students left without a group let me know and we try to arrange an assignment to one of the groups.  Regards, Mustafa Anil Safran
